settings.label: Free Shipping Threshold
settings.info: The minimum order value for free shipping. Set to 0 to disable.

settings.label: Color swatch configuration
settings.info: Each rule must be its own line. [Learn more](https://support.troopthemes.com/guide/color-swatch-guide) about naming conventions.

settings.label: Create account copy
settings.info: This appears above 'Create Account' button, on Account Login page.
settings.default:
New here? Or shopped with us, but didn’t sign up?

Welcome! Sign up to activate your account.

settings.label: Points Per Pound
settings.info: How many Points Per Pound. This will calculate points X pounds in cart. Related to Growave. Set to 0 to disable.

settings.label: Cart Drawer Intro Copy. Logged IN, with points.
settings.info: This text appears on the Cart Drawer. Enter Pointers per Pound to use this. Use Variable {points} to show points.
settings.default: Earn up to {points} loyalty points for this order when you check out.

settings.label: Cart Drawer Intro Copy. Logged OUT, with points.
settings.info: This text appears on the Cart Drawer. Enter Pointers per Pound to use this. Use Variable {points} to show points.
settings.default: Join the Christy Community and earn up to {points} loyalty points for this order when you check out.

settings.label: DEFAULT Cart Drawer Intro Copy.
settings.info: This text appears on the Cart Drawer. Shows if no points are set.

settings.label: Cart Drawer Sustainably Copy
settings.info: This text before sub-total on the Cart Drawer
settings.default: We ship sustainably, sending orders in as few boxes as possible to reduce the number of delivery trips.

settings.content: These buttons appear on the Cart Drawer. Leave blank to hide.

settings.label: Pre Order Text - Cart
settings.default: This Item is a pre order. Will be delivered as soon as stock is available. Normal delivery timelines do not apply.

settings.label: Product Samples Title
settings.default: Add product samples to the order for testing

settings.label: Product Samples Description
settings.default: If you didn’t find the color you’re looking for, we can show you all our material samples.

settings.default: Enter your email for our monthly newsletter + 10% off your first purchase.
